element.definition: Describes the event of a patient being administered a vaccination or a record of a vaccination as reported by a patient, a clinician or another party and may include vaccine reaction information and what vaccination protocol was followed.

constraint.human: If immunization was administered (wasNotGiven=false) then explanation.reasonNotGiven SHALL be absent.
If immunization was not administred (wasNotGiven=true) then there SHALL be no reaction nor explanation.reason present
